name: (DEMO) Cupcake: an Apartment Adventure
description:
You are a baker living in Sugarlake apartment complex. On a whim, you made some cupcakes and now the only question left is what to do with them?
Will you eat them?
Will you share them?
Will you throw them off the roof?
There are multiple endings to discover.

This is a Demo for the upcoming game, Cupcake: an Apartment Adventure, a game where you the player uses 6 cupcakes to unlock a plethora of goofy endings. This demo is set in the main character's apartment ( the first room).
